summary: 1999 DODGE INTREPID, 5 STAR DEALER MAINTAINED HAS EXPERIENCED ENGINE FAILURE AT 60389 MILES.  HAVE SPOKEN WITH MANY OTHERS THAT HAVE EXPERIENCED THIS PROBLEM.  ACCORDING TO AN ENGINE REBUILD SHOP THE FAILURE IS CAUSED BY POOR DESIGN OF THE ENGINE.  EXCESSIVE SLUDGE BUILDS UP AND EVENTUALLY STARVES THE ENGINE FOR OIL RESULTING IN BEARING FAILURE AND/OR BROKEN CONNECTING RODS.  ANOTHER ENGINE REBUILDING SERVICE CLAIMS THAT REBUILDING IS A WASTE OF MONEY AND THE REBUILT ENGINE IS DOOMED TO FAILURE.  *JB
